text: Napoleon wasn’t short. He was average height and the whole 'tiny dictator' thing was British war propaganda. 🇫🇷📏

text: George Washington had laser teeth made by Tesla. It’s in the Smithsonian but they won’t show it. 😬⚡

text: Oxford University is older than the Aztec Empire. Western education supremacy is wild. 🎓🗿
explanation: Yes. Oxford was founded in 1096. The Aztec Empire began around 1428.

text: They taught us the Library of Alexandria burned once. It burned MULTIPLE times. 🏛️🔥🔥
explanation: True. The library was damaged or destroyed in stages by multiple events over centuries.

text: Hitler escaped to Argentina and lived into the 1970s. The FBI files are public. 🇩🇪🕵️‍♂️🇦🇷
explanation: False. Hitler died by suicide in 1945. Theories of escape to Argentina have been debunked repeatedly.

text: The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes. That’s shorter than an episode of The Office. ⏱️⚔️
explanation: Correct. The Anglo-Zanzibar War of 1896 lasted between 38 and 45 minutes.
